name: Ducks & Pixels
description:
A short game about saving an image from being taken apart one pixel at a time by a group of evil rubber ducks.

Third-party resources:

Background image: https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/mixed-fruits-with-apple-banana-orange-other_3...

Duck sprite: https://pixabay.com/illustrations/rubber-duck-duck-animal-toy-6868961/
